General.Name: Johnson Health Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Johnson Health Tech. Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells sports and fitness equipment in the Americas, Europe, China, and internationally. It offers cardiovascular and weight training equipment, and related electronic components, as well as video transmission and streaming service; researches, develops, manufactures, and trades in massage chairs; and sells food products. Johnson Health Tech. Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1975 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.
